mapper.select: select left(sidoCode,2) sidoCode, sidoName from sidocode order by sidoCode
select left(gugunCode,5) gugunCode, gugunName from guguncode where left(gugunCode,2) = #{sido} order by gugunCode
select distinct dongName, dongCode from baseaddress where left(dongCode, 5) = #{gugun} order by dongName

select h.aptCode, h.apartmentName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dong, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname,h.roadName, (select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) recentPrice from houseinfo h left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5) where dongCode = #{dong} order by apartmentName

select h.aptCode, h.apartmentName, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dong, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname,h.roadName, (select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) recentPrice from houseinfo h left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5) where sidoname like concat('%',#{sidoName},'%') order by apartmentName
select lat, lng from baseaddress where dongCode = #{dong}
select dealAmount, dealYear, area, floor from housedeal where aptCode=#{aptCode};

select h.aptCode, h.apartmentname, h.buildyear, h.dongCode, h.dong, h.jibun, h.lat, h.lng, si.sidoname, gu.gugunname, h.roadName, (6371*acos(cos(radians(#{lat}))*cos(radians(lat))*cos(radians(lng)-radians(#{lng})) +sin(radians(#{lat}))*sin(radians(lat)))) distance, (select dealAmount from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode and no = (select max(no) from housedeal where aptCode = h.aptCode)) recentPrice from houseinfo h left join sidocode si on left(h.dongcode,2) = left(si.sidocode,2) left join guguncode gu on left(h.dongcode,5) = left(gu.guguncode,5) having distance < #{distance} order by apartmentname;
